detail_desc: T-shirt in soft jersey with a contrasting colour trim around the neckline and sleeves.

NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Espadrilles in patterned cotton canvas with a sequined appliqué, elastic gores in the sides and a braided jute trim around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Swim shorts in woven fabric made from recycled polyester with an elasticated, drawstring waist. Discreet side pockets and a flap back pocket with a hook and loop fastening and small metal eyelet. Short slits in the sides of the hems. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Fully lined balconette bikini top with moulded, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Wide, adjustable, detachable shoulder straps that can be fastened in various ways, and a wide metal fastener at the back.
Fisherman's hat in cotton twill with an embroidered motif. Width of brim 7 cm.
Sandals in scuba fabric with two straps with adjustable hook and loop fastenings and a heel strap with a loop. Moulded ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Bikini briefs in cotton jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Long dress in a crinkled weave with lacing at the top, a gathered seam at the waist and a wide skirt with gathered tiers. Unlined.
Hipster briefs in lace and microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Trousers in soft cotton twill with covered elastication and a frill trim at the top, and side and back pockets. Relaxed fit with a wide jersey waist panel for best fit over the tummy and tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short 5-pocket shorts in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and press-stud.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Joggers in soft jersey with wide elastication at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Silk tie in a grosgrain weave. Width 7 cm.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Chelsea boots in imitation suede with elastic gores in the sides, a loop at the back and trainer-style soles. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Skirt in stretch cotton corduroy with patch front pockets and a zip fly and button.
Short, long-sleeved dress in woven fabric with an opening and button at the back of the neck, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Short, cold shoulder lace dress with a second layer of lace at the top that continues over the arms. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined.
Sun hat in a cotton weave with elastication and a decorative bow at the back and ties under the chin. Lined.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Maxi dress in a viscose weave with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps, a smocked bodice with a small frill trim at the top and tiers to the hem. Unlined.
Baby Exclusive. Garter-stitched dress in soft organic cotton with buttons at the front, long raglan sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.

Dress in a patterned viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, an elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist, and side pockets. Unlined.
Loafers in imitation suede with moccasin seams and decorative lacing. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Jersey fancy dress cape with a concealed hook and loop fastening at the neck and a hood with appliqués. Unlined.
Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.

Off-the-shoulder dress in an airy weave with an elasticated flounce at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a flounce at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 50x50 cm.
Sun visor in braided paper straw decorated with a grosgrain and metal chain band at the front. Sweatband in woven fabric, and covered elastication at the back.
Top in sturdy jersey with a wrapover funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and v-cut at the front.
Suede court shoes with pointed toes, open sides and a strap across the foot. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heels 8 cm.
Metal chain necklace with large pendants in various designs. Adjustable length, 51-58 cm.
Leggings in soft, pointelle-knit organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and overlocked edges at the hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch cotton denim with hard-worn details in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Long-sleeved, checked shirt in a viscose weave with a frilled collar and frills at the shoulders. Buttons down the front and at the cuffs and a rounded hem.
Longer top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cardigan in a soft textured knit with a V-neck, loop fasteners with pearly plastic beads down the front and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Cotton canvas trainers with elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Straight, wide-fitting dress in jersey crêpe with short sleeves and a rounded hem.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, polarised lenses. Supplied with a fabric storage pouch.
Short, wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short cycling shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Boots in imitation leather with chisel toes, block heels, a tall shaft and loops at the sides. Linings in satin made from recycled polyester, and imitation leather insoles. Heel 7.5 cm.

Easy pull-on joggers in soft cotton corduroy. Casual style in a relaxed fit with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and covered elastication at the hems.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and adjustable belt. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a text print and dropped shoulders in a relaxed fit.
Block-coloured T-shirt in cotton jersey with a text print on the shoulders.
Necklaces in various lengths and designs. One ball chain choker and two slightly longer necklaces with a pendant. Adjustable length 37-45 cm, 46.5-52 cm and 54.5-60.5 cm.

Bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow metal chain and imitation leather shoulder strap. Flap with a decorative, gold-coloured metal ring and concealed magnetic fastener. One inner compartment. Lined. Size 7x17x20 cm.
Rib-knit jumper in wool containing some cashmere. V-neck, extra-long, wide raglan sleeves, high slits in the sides and elasticated ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Top with short, flounced sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated waist and gathered frills at the hems.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless dress in slub cotton jersey with woven broderie anglaise flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders, a gathered seam at the hips and a flared skirt.

Short-sleeved shirt in an airy cotton weave with a tie or bow tie. Shirt with a collar, classic front, yoke with a pleat at the back and rounded hem. Pre-tied tie or bow tie with an elastic strap and adjustable plastic fastener.
Bucket bag in grained imitation leather with two handles and a drawstring at the top and one inner compartment. Size 12x28x30 cm.
Tights in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Top with raglan sleeves, buttons down one side and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Trousers with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.

Sleeveless, full-length dress in a patterned weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a deep V-neck at the front and an open back. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, a seam at the waist and gently flared skirt with a concealed zip at the back. Lined.

Set with a top and trousers in sturdy, block-coloured sweatshirt fabric. Top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with elastication and an internal drawstring at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless body in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Low-cut neckline front and back, wide shoulder straps, decorative buttons at the front and concealed press-studs at the crotch.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered and rubber text print on the front and embroidered appliqués on the sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Leather sandals with straps with adjustable fasteners and a tab with a hook and loop fastening at the back. Moulded thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short, elasticated friendship necklaces, each with a glittery pendant and text print.
Sleeveless, V-neck blouse in an airy cotton weave with an embroidered frill trim around the neckline and armholes and a gently rounded hem. Unlined.
Short-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Sleeveless, draped satin nursing blouse with a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud and practical inner top for easier nursing access.

Parka in woven fabric with a sheen, a lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim, zip down the front and drawstring and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets with a concealed press-stud and concealed side pockets. Raglan sleeves with inner ribbing and a zipped sleeve pocket. Quilted lining. Polyester filling.
Calf-length dress in a soft rib knit containing some wool with long sleeves and a wrapover front with wide ties at one side.
High-waisted shorts in superstretch twill with back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fine-knit gloves with matching fingerless gloves with a glow-in-the-dark print. The gloves can be worn over each other or separately.
Short 5-pocket skirt in cotton corduroy with a zip fly and button.

Jacket in soft fleece designed to be worn either as a jacket or as a thermal mid layer. Stand-up collar, concealed zip down the front and side pockets. Unlined. Regular Fit. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
